title: Emma Raducanu's Big Tennis Comeback
summary: Emma Raducanu, a British tennis player, has reached her first final since winning the US Open in 2021. She played a tough match against Oleksandra Oliynykova and won in three sets. Raducanu became famous when she won the US Open as a young qualifier, but she has faced many injuries and coaching changes since then. This win is special because it shows she is fighting hard again. She will now play Sorana Cirstea in the final. Another British player, Katie Boulter, also made a final on the same day, making it a great day for British women's tennis. Raducanu thanked the crowd in Romania, where her father is from, for their support.

background_read: Emma Raducanu is a tennis player from Britain who became famous by winning the US Open in 2021 when she was only 18 years old. She was a qualifier, which means she had to win extra matches just to get into the tournament. Since then, she has had many injuries and changed coaches often, making it hard for her to win more tournaments. Tennis tournaments have finals where the best players compete for the trophy. This article talks about her recent win that puts her in a final again, showing her determination and the support from fans in Romania, where her family is from.

WHAT: Raducanu won a tough match to reach her first final since 2021, and Katie Boulter also reached a final, making it a historic day for British women's tennis.
